keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritizing climate change and protecting surroundings, improving schools, ensuring resources to do better, and having the right houses in the right places.
Building on business corridor to attract new enterprise, increase investment, and ensure skills base to meet commercial demand.
Ensuring proper care for the elderly including tackling loneliness, supporting mental health initiatives for children and young people, and improving access to mental health services.

issues.environment: Prioritizing climate change and protecting surroundings.
issues.health: Supporting mental health initiatives for children and young people, and improving access to mental health services.
issues.socialWelfare: Ensuring proper care for the elderly including tackling loneliness.

housing.content: Having the right houses in the right places.
